subject: Using JUnit in GPL licensed projects
msgSnippet: Hi, how can junit be used in gpl projects? I think it s not possible to publish junit based tests of gpl software. Junit tests cannot be published under gpl

Hi,

how can junit be used in gpl projects? I think it's not possible to
p=
ublish junit based tests of gpl software. 
Junit tests cannot be published =
under gpl because licenses are
incompatible. 
Tests that use gpl code have =
to be published under the gpl. q.e.d.
Has anybody experiences with this top=
ic? Any thoughts?

Joachim
